name: Touhou Guard Break (working title)
description:
Submission for Touhou Fan Game Jam 6! (Theme: Combo)

As Satori Komeiji, take a short stroll through the streets of Former Hell. Something doesn't seem quite right though...

Best enjoyed with external music because I wasn't able to make any music or sounds.

All assets, programming, etc are by me.

Touhou Project is property of ZUN.
